name: MineGold
description:
You start in a random generated 9x9 chunk! How much gold can you mine? Luck but also skill is required to get as much gold as you can!
You can also build, so if you get bored just try to build a dirt house in that 1 minute instead lol

Controls:
WASD or Keys to move around
Left click to mine
Right click to build
1 - Switch to dirt, 2 - Switch to stone, 3 - Switch to Diorite
F11 - Full Screen Mode
F3 - View your FPS in top right corner
M - Mute all sounds
ESC - Exit

Made for the Mini Jam 85: Gold using Python, framework Ursina.
